short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension live AI assistant to give you recommendations during your sales calls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capy is a live assistance tool that allows you to receive live transcripts and provides realtime recommendations during your customer calls with suggested actions and responses.
